job_title: Software Engineer - Azure Core New Tech Team
job_purpose: To enable new technologies by understanding requirements, creating designs, and implementing features to automate the onboarding process of new hardware for Microsoft datacenters within Azure, High-Performance Computing, Office, and Edge Computing products.
job_duties_and_responsibilities: Determine user requirements for scenarios in collaboration with stakeholders
Develop design documents for products, applications, services, or platforms
Implement, optimize, debug, refactor, and reuse code to improve performance and maintainability
Guide project plans, release plans, and work items leveraging subject-matter expertise
Act as a Designated Responsible Individual (DRI) to monitor system/product/service and initiate actions for problem resolution
Stay updated on new trends, technical solutions, and patterns to enhance product performance and reliability
required_qualifications: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science or related technical discipline AND 4+ years technical engineering experience with coding in languages including, but not limited to, C, C++, C#, Java, JavaScript, or Python
Experience in operating systems like Linux or FreeBSD adaptable to the Windows environment used in Microsoft

Experience in operating system development, kernel module, kernel debugging, hardware driver development, new hardware qualification, network stack experience, routing table, IPv6, network packet analysis
Ability to work cross-team and collaborate effectively
Ability to prioritize tasks and work independently
Excellent hands-on design, coding, and problem-solving skills
Ability to meet Microsoft, customer, and/or government security screening requirements
preferred_qualifications: Master's Degree in Computer Science or related technical field AND 6+ years technical engineering experience with coding in languages including, but not limited to, C, C++, C#, Java, JavaScript, or Python
